Sample Plain Text Document

This is a test plain text document used for parser integration testing.

Section 1: Introduction
-----------------------
Plain text files are simple and widely used for storing textual information.
They contain no formatting, just raw text content.

Section 2: Content
------------------
This section contains additional content to ensure the parser handles
multi-line text files correctly. The parser should extract all text
as a single page.

Section 3: Conclusion
---------------------
This document demonstrates that the text parser can handle standard
plain text files with multiple sections and paragraphs.
